quote: Not all pre-approval letters are created equal. It's important to have the actual address of the property on the letter.
why_clipworthy: This highlights a specific tactic that can immediately improve offer acceptance rates.
suggested_hook: Are your pre-approval letters costing you deals?

quote: A 2-1 rate buydown can allow buyers to afford more house with a lower initial payment.
why_clipworthy: Challenges the notion that high rates are a deal-breaker by offering a creative solution.
suggested_hook: Think high interest rates are a deal killer? Think again!
